law.catch_line: Compensation and expense reimbursement of selection committee members.

text.section: Selection committee members who are not employees of state agencies or state universities shall receive a salary of two hundred dollars ($200) per day for those days authorized by the selection committee for selection committee activities.

Selection committee members who are employees of state agencies or state universities shall not receive a salary for their time spent on selection committee activities, and the state government salaries of these committee members shall not be reduced due to time spent away from other state government activities.
All selection committee members shall be reimbursed for costs necessarily incurred in carrying out their duties. All reimbursements shall be authorized by the selection committee.
The procuring agency shall pay all costs generated under this section by a selection committee.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 319, sec. 6, effective April 3, 1998. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992.
